description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. B-A-Maze'd is a very fun and ingenious 3D maze based game in which you move the maze not the character in order to reach the heart of the character's favourite girl!!!. The game lets the players use powerups to attack other players or ease their way in the maze.
